entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
